excerpt.rendered:
Part of The Macallan Masters Decanter Series, M is the iconic result of an unprecedented collaboration between three masters of their crafts who shared the same unique objective – to create the world’s most sophisticated whisky contained in an exquisite, exclusively designed crystal decanter.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : NAS
Vintage : 
ABV : 45.90%
